pyi.heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
pyi.reason: We cannot prove your identity right now.
pyi.option1Text: Continue to the service you were trying to use and look for other ways to prove your identity.
pyi.contactText: Contact us (opens in a new tab)

pyi.description: technical error in the Passport CRI and we don't have enough information to be able to redirect the user back to IVP Core
pyi.heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
pyi.reason:
We cannot prove your identity right now.

You can go to the GOV.UK homepage to find the service you were trying to use.

pyi.heading: Page not found
pyi.reason:
If you typed the web address, check it's correct.

If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pyi.option1Text: You can also go to the GOV.UK homepage to find the service you were trying to use.

pyi.description: When DCS or Experian can't match to a record or When user fails experian velocity check
pyi.heading: Sorry, we cannot prove your identity right now
pyi.reason:
This might be because we could not match your details to information from another database.

To keep your information safe, we cannot tell you which of your details we had trouble finding a match for.

This could also be because you've been unsuccessful when you've previously tried to prove your identity online.
pyi.option1Text: Continue to the service you were trying to use and look for other ways to prove your identity.
pyi.contactText: Contact us (opens in a new tab)

pyi.description: When user fails the kbv challenge
pyi.heading: Sorry, we cannot prove your identity right now
pyi.reason:
This might be because you gave the wrong answer to some of the security questions.

To keep your information safe, we cannot show you which questions you answered incorrectly.
pyi.option1Text: Continue to the service you were trying to use and look for other ways to prove your identity.
pyi.contactText: Contact us (opens in a new tab)

pyi.description: backward movement from a KBV question page
pyi.heading: Sorry, you cannot go back from that page
pyi.reason: You cannot go back to the previous page because you've already answered some of the security questions.
pyi.subheading: What would you like to do?
pyi.option2Text: Stop answering the questions and prove your identity another way
pyi.contactText: Contact us (opens in a new tab)

pyi.heading: Sorry, you cannot go back from that page
pyi.reason: You cannot go back because we've already checked the information you gave us on the previous page.
pyi.subheading: What would you like to do?
pyi.option1Text: Return to the page you were on
pyi.option2Text: Continue to the service you were trying to use and look for other ways to prove your identity
pyi.contactText: Contact us (opens in a new tab)
